attributes.action: Allow Chris brown back into the uk
attributes.additional_details: LET HIM PERFORM IN THE UK
attributes.background: Almost 10 years ago Chris brown who was still young at the time made a mistake he has to live with the rest of his life and also has done his time for it yet the UK are still being punished by not letting him into the uk. we have missed out on 10 years worth of concerts.It's time he was allowed back
